parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
